actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain air traffic specialists be considered as air traffic controllers for retirement and certain other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that air traffic specialists employed by the Department of Transportation be considered as air traffic controllers for retirement and other purposes under Federal law.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain air traffic specialists be considered as air traffic controllers for retirement and certain other purposes.
